description: Jeanne Antoinette Poisson, Marquise de Pompadour, also known as Madame de Pompadour, is the official mistress (ma√Ætresse-en-titre) of Louis XV. Maintaining her own network of spies and agents, she attempts to orchestrate the affairs of France and Europe from behind the scenes. Her character is loosely based on the historical Marquise de Pompadour (1721-1764).
name: Pompadour-fujin
